channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [FLINK-10773] Resume externalized checkpoint end-to-end test fails
item.description: The test_resume_externalized_checkpoints.sh fails because the log verification does not ignore the artificial failure reason and the ExceptionThrowingFailureMapper name of a mapper.
item.summary: Resume externalized checkpoint end-to-end test fails

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
tillrohrmann opened a new pull request #7018: FLINK-10773 Harden resume externalized checkpoint end-to-end test
URL: https://github.com/apache/flink/pull/7018

    1. What is the purpose of the change

Ignore the 'Artificial Failure' exceptions and rename
ExceptionThrowingFailureMapper into FailureMapper to avoid false
positive exception matchings.

    1. Verifying this change
  • Manually tested
    1. Does this pull request potentially affect one of the following parts:
  • Dependencies (does it add or upgrade a dependency): (no)
  • The public API, i.e., is any changed class annotated with `@Public(Evolving)`: (no)
  • The serializers: (no)
  • The runtime per-record code paths (performance sensitive): (no)
  • Anything that affects deployment or recovery: JobManager (and its components), Checkpointing, Yarn/Mesos, ZooKeeper: (no)
  • The S3 file system connector: (no)
    1. Documentation
  • Does this pull request introduce a new feature? (no)
  • If yes, how is the feature documented? (not applicable)

tillrohrmann closed pull request #7018: FLINK-10773 Harden resume externalized checkpoint end-to-end test
URL: https://github.com/apache/flink/pull/7018

This is a PR merged from a forked repository.
As GitHub hides the original diff on merge, it is displayed below for
the sake of provenance:

As this is a foreign pull request (from a fork), the diff is supplied
below (as it won't show otherwise due to GitHub magic):

Fixed via
master: https://github.com/apache/flink/commit/31e0098abd267d1219d93a3564b65f69e3282bd7
1.7.0: https://github.com/apache/flink/commit/80bed3d87b2722f0f6c04930b3ab1bdde860962c
I think this issue also needs to be fixed in the release-1.6 branch.
